1.content:
What shall we do with Lil jaws?

Note, please make the chapter longer than one sentence, thank you.C:
1.title: Choices to pick

info.brief_description: An interactive of my sona Lil Jaws going through some interesting adventures.
info.description:
Here we have a fun interactive with my sona Lil Jaws. He is gonna be going through many toony adventures and meets lots of new friends along the way.

If you want to know more about my sona, drop me a message about my sona and I will provide much more details. However, I will give a quick description of him. Lil Jaws or Jaws is a human shark hybrid, head of a human and the body of one too but has his sharky tail and fin, from his neck down to his toes he has great white sharkskin while his head is normal human skin.

The many things that Lil Jaws will be going through consists of classic cartoon physics like inflation and flattening, etc. Jaws won't be the only character to go through the changes, some of her friends will also be going through some of them as well and some of them may or may not have superpowers.

Things that are ok are: Inflation, Weight gain, Flattening, Transformations, Small crossovers, popping, soft-hardcore vore, some body part expansion.

The things that are not alright in this interactive are these things: Scat, Waterworks, Dippers.
